Parallels.ab: daδuuā̊ŋhəm ahurəm mazdąm yazamaide = Y6.1, Y16.4, Y16.5, VrS81.1.

daēnąm vaŋᵛhīm māzdaiiasnīm = Y6.12; ~ Y15.1, Y22.4, Y22.24, Y22.25, Y24.3, Y24.8, Y24.29, Y25.3, Y35.1, Y53.11 (x2), Y66.19, Y66.20, Y70.3, Y72.7, Y72.11, VrS87.11 daēnaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ māzdaiiasnōiš; ~ Y9.26, Yt16.5, Yt16.8, Yt16.11, Yt16.14, Yt16.16, Yt16.18 vaŋᵛhīm daēnąm māzdaiiasnīm.
aṣ̌īm vaŋᵛhīm = Y6.14, Y13.1, Y17.15, Y38.2, Y59.15, VrS81.14, Yt17 (passim); ~ Y43.6, Y68.22 vaŋᵛhīm aṣ̌īm.
asmanəm yazamaide ~ Y71.9 vīspəmca asmanəm yazamaide
mąϑrəm spəṇtəm yazamaide ~ Y71.5 vīspəmca mąϑrəm spəṇtəm yazamaide.
